Hero.title: CRESTIA
Hero.subtitle: THE MYSTIC LINEAGE
Hero.description: Preserving the eternal legacy of elite geckos.

About.identityDesc: Every gecko is assigned a unique digital certificate, preserving its legacy forever on the blockchain of biology.
About.pedigreeDesc: Visualize generations of lineage. Connect sires and dams to unveil the genetic history of your collection.
About.marketDesc: A curated sanctuary for elite breeders to showcase their masterpieces to the world.
